availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gustavus Artsman (Campbell County attorney and Circuit Court Clerk)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky attorney and Campbell County Circuit Court Clerk. Saxony native. Married Sallie Artsman. Campbell County Circuit Court Clerk from c1858 to c1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 182. Passport Applications, 1795-1905, Roll 229, May 23, 1879, no. 12656, National Archives and Records Administration, Washington, D.C. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 2. Thomas S. Page, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1859 (Frankfort, KY: John B. Major, 1860), p. 290. Grant Green, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861 (Frankfort, KY: John B. Major, 1862), p. 305. KYR-0001-029-0586. “Gustavus Artsman,” Find A Grave, memorial no. 90113818 (accessed June 1, 2017).
